topic.title: CANCER CARE SPELL DELAY REASON (OUTCOME COMMUNICATION CANCER FASTER DIAGNOSIS PATHWAY)
topic.shortdesc: CANCER CARE SPELL DELAY REASON (OUTCOME COMMUNICATION CANCER FASTER DIAGNOSIS PATHWAY) is the reason why a Cancer Care Spell Delay occurred, where the Health Care Provider was unable to communicate the outcome of the Cancer Faster Diagnosis Pathway to the PATIENT within the service standard of 28 days.
